name: Commissioned comic PORTRAIT Photorealist version, Convert yourself or your friends into a SUPERHERO
description:
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
THE PRICE THAT APPEARS IN THE LISTING IS PER PERSON/CHARACTER
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++


Do you wanna see yourself in the skin of Spiderman or Batman? Have you ever dream of being a superhero? Do you have a comic fan friend birthday and you don't know which present to give him/her?

This is the best present you may give him/her then!!.

Send me several pics (close ups) of you or your friends, and give me some details of the type of superhero you would like to look like, or the pose you wanna be painted.

The more pictures you send me , the better idea of your facial physiognomy i will have.
.
That will allow me to draw you in many different poses. Also tell me, what kind of superhero would you like to be you can also send me an image of the character you wanna be customized like.

if you have a very specific idea , the more details i receive the more closed the result will be to what you want.

If not, don't worry, I CAN CREATE A SUPER NEW CHARACTER ONLY FOR YOU!!

It not necessary has to be a super hero, you or your friend can be your favourite football player, or whatever!!

I can also create hyper realistic portraits of yourself dressed as u like, a famous retro pilot or so!!

There is no limit!!

name: Custom commissioned portrait- Get you painted as gorgeous Pin-up. PHOTOREALISTIC VERSION
description:
Custom commissioned portrait- Convert yourself / friend / couple into a gorgeous Pin-up. PHOTOREALISTIC VERSION


Send me several pics (close ups) of you or your friends, and give me some details of the type of superhero you would like to look like, or the pose you wanna be painted.

The more pictures you send me , the better idea of your facial physiognomy i will have.
.
That will allow me to draw you in many different poses. Also tell me, what kind of PIN UP would you like to be you can also send me an image of the character you wanna be customized like.

if you have a very specific idea , the more details i receive the more closed the result will be to what you want.

If not, don't worry, I CAN CREATE A SUPER PRETTY PIN UP ONLY FOR YOU!!

I can also include the message you want in the illustration.

There is no limit!!

Size: About 210 x 297 mm. (A4), leaving a white border for framing.

Printed on matte paper (192 g)


*If you want a different size I can customize it for you. I can adapt it to be a greeting card or whatever format you need!!

Depending on the characteristics of the request the deadline may slightly vary, dont worry as soon as i get your mail , pics and specifications i will reply to you with an estimated deadline!! after that its up to you to make the purchase or not!

name: 2 custom portraits in a double sided bubble magnifying locket necklace.
description:
Two custom commissioned portrait in a double sided bubble glass pendant, magnifying locket necklace. 

As usual send my your pics and tell me what do you wanna be in the portrait... in this case a brave explorer /traveller and a girl from a savage tribe.

Portrait will be placed into this supply see (https://www.etsy.com/transaction/112963332) to create the more original and romantic present.

***************************************************************************
*2 custom commissioned portraits
* Bubble glass window with brass case
* Size: 30mm x 30mm
* Quantity: 1 piece
***************************************************************************


Depending on the characteristics of the request the deadline may slightly vary, dont worry as soon as i get your mail , pics and specifications i will reply to you with an estimated deadline!! after that its up to you to make the purchase or not!

You can see more products related to CUSTOM COMMISIONED PORTRAIT IN HERE.

name: Create your own customized CD cover . Commissioned cartooned portrait plus packaging design
description:
A music compilation is probably one of the most beautiful and typical presents for Valentine's / Anniversary Day.

Add an extra value to your present wtih a custom cartonized protrait cover for your CD,

You chose the music and I will create the case for your cd (CD not included)

Price is per person to draw + design mock up of the cover

as usual....

Send me several pics (close ups) of you or your friends, and give me some details of the type of superhero you would like to look like, or the pose you wanna be painted.

The more pictures you send me , the better idea of your facial physiognomy i will have.
.
That will allow me to draw you in many different poses. Also tell me, what kind of PIN UP would you like to be you can also send me an image of the character you wanna be customized like.

if you have a very specific idea , the more details i receive the more closed the result will be to what you want.

I can also include the message you want in the illustration. I will let you some blank space to let you write the names of the songs or whatever inscription you would like to add by hand

There is no limit!!
